body_html:
My reason is https certificate always wrong when download https zip in WORKSPACE. I try to keytool import cert, it had no effect. Also because I do not how to configure cert when my company use a proxy to Internet.
Finally, I download all http/https zip by WGET with --no-check-cert(not precise), then install Apache server and modify http/https link to my Apache server url, bazel build success!!!
body_text:
My reason is https certificate always wrong when download https zip in WORKSPACE. I try to keytool import cert, it had no effect. Also because I do not how to configure cert when my company use a proxy to Internet.
Finally, I download all http/https zip by WGET with --no-check-cert(not precise), then install Apache server and modify http/https link to my Apache server url, bazel build success!!!
body:
My reason is https certificate always wrong when download https zip in WORKSPACE. I try to keytool import cert, it had no effect. Also because I do not how to configure cert when my company use a proxy to Internet.
Finally, I download all http/https zip by WGET with --no-check-cert(not precise), then install Apache server and modify http/https link to my Apache server url, bazel build success!!!
